name: Alone Together (Anheurystics)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare 30 (Jam). I consider this only as a prototype of a possible concept.

MENU Controls

  • SPACE - start selected level
  • A/D/LEFT/RIGHT - change selected level

GAME Controls

  • AD - Walk left/right
  • W - Jump
  • S - Open doors/Pickup items
  • ARROWS - Change world
  • ESC - back to menu
